memberdef.argsstring: (gauden_t *g, char const *mixwfile, char const *sen2mgau_map_file, float32 mixwfloor, logmath_t *lmath, bin_mdef_t *mdef)
memberdef.name: senone_init

briefdescription.para: In: file specifying mapping from each senone to mixture gaussian codebook. If NULL all senones map to codebook 0
In: Floor value for senone weights
Load a set of senones (mixing weights and mixture gaussian codebook mappings) from the given files.

detaileddescription.para:
Normalize weights for each codebook, apply the given floor, convert PDF values to logs3 domain and quantize to 8-bits.
pointer to senone structure created. Caller MUST NOT change its contents.
